ui.name: Button
ui.description: Versatile button component with 7 variants (primary, secondary, success, danger, warning, ghost, link), 5 sizes, loading state, and icon support. Fully accessible.

ui.name: Input
ui.description: Form input component with variants (default, filled, flushed), label, error/helper text, and icon support. Includes validation states.

ui.name: Card
ui.description: Container card component with customizable padding, hover effects, and shadow. Perfect for content grouping.

ui.name: Badge
ui.description: Badge/pill component for labels and status indicators with 5 variants (default, primary, success, danger, warning).

ui.name: Avatar
ui.description: Avatar component with image support and automatic initials fallback. Multiple sizes available.

sections.name: NavigationHeader
sections.description: Fixed top navigation with logo, menu items, language switcher, and CTA button. Includes mobile menu and responsive design.

sections.name: HeroSection
sections.description: Main hero section with headline, subheadline, typewriter animation effect, metric cards, and dual CTA buttons. Includes animated background decorations and dot grid pattern.

sections.name: FeaturesSection
sections.description: 3-column feature showcase section with icons, titles, descriptions, and benefit lists. Perfect for displaying product modules or key features.

sections.name: BenefitsSection
sections.description: 4-column benefits grid with animated counters, icons, and value propositions. Includes intersection observer for scroll-triggered animations.

sections.name: PricingSection
sections.description: 3-tier pricing section with feature comparison, badges (recommended, coming soon), highlighted plans, and billing toggle (monthly/yearly).

sections.name: RoadmapSection
sections.description: Timeline-style roadmap section with milestones, status indicators (completed, in-progress, planned), and feature lists. Includes vertical timeline with animated icons.

sections.name: TestimonialsSection
sections.description: Testimonials carousel with client quotes, ratings, images, and navigation controls. Supports autoplay, pause, and manual navigation.

sections.name: ClientLogosSection
sections.description: Horizontal scrolling carousel for client/company logos with auto-scroll functionality and hover pause. Includes fade edges and grayscale effects.

sections.name: ContactSection
sections.description: Full-featured contact form with validation, progress indicator, success/error states, privacy checkbox, and social proof metrics. Includes responsive layout and accessibility features.

sections.name: Footer
sections.description: Comprehensive footer with brand info, multiple link columns, contact information, social links, legal links, and copyright. Fully responsive design.

sections.name: HeroSplitScreen
sections.description: Advanced split-screen hero section with glassmorphism floating cards, trust indicators with ratings, feature list with icons, and dual CTAs. Includes animated floating elements and responsive design.

sections.name: IsometricCardsSection
sections.description: Modern section with 3D isometric card effects using CSS perspective transforms. Features smooth hover interactions, customizable gradients, and optional badges. Perfect for showcasing features or services.

sections.name: WhyChooseSection
sections.description: Benefits section with integrated statistics display. Each card shows an icon with gradient, title, description, and prominent stat with label. Ideal for communicating value and measurable results.

sections.name: CTASectionAdvanced
sections.description: Premium CTA section with split layout featuring benefits checklist with gradient checkmarks, trust indicators with avatars and star ratings, optional badge, and prominent mockup image. Designed for high conversion.
